item.title: Rivian-Volkswagen joint venture up deal to $5.8 billion, VW cars expected as early as 2027
item.description: The companies said the deal is now up to $5.8 billion – up from $5 billion – with the first VW models to use Rivian's software and electrical architec...

item.title: Bitcoin to top $100,000 before year-end, according to bettors on Kalshi
item.description: Sixty percent of bettors on the Kalshi platform now believe that bitcoin could top the $100,000 mark before the end of 2024.

item.title: Home Depot’s sales are improving, but it says consumers are still cautious about spending
item.description: Home Depot is mired in a sales slump as homeowners put off major projects.

item.title: Israel not in violation of U.S. law, but Gaza aid situation will be monitored: State Dept.
item.description: U.S. says there will be no major policy shift towards Israel at the end of 30-day deadline for improvement in humanitarian aid delivery to Gaza.

item.title: Dow falls more than 350 points, retreating from record as postelection rally takes breather: Live updates
item.description: Stocks were lower Tuesday as Wall Street took a breather from a postelection rally that brought the major U.S. benchmarks to all-time highs.
